title: bold techy looking font used in a logo
content:
This font was used in the creation of a logo and I'm not sure anybody knows what it is anymore. All graphics using it appear to be small / low res and image based now.

I have found a number of fonts that look similar like 'Sneakers Pro Medium Oblique' however the 'Y' appears to be very unique especially with this font.

Font: 

 Padaloma Italic 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200152/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [anotherlogo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317200152/http:/typophile.com/files/anotherlogo.png) | 48.83 KB |
author: jonny_8909

comments.content:

Squashed a little.
